API¶

Kernel classes¶

cpkernel.cosipy_core

cpkernel.grid.Node

The Node-class stores the state variables of layer.

Utilities¶

aws2cosipy.aws2cosipy

This file reads the input data (model forcing) and write the output to netcdf file.

wrf2cosipy.wrf2cosipy

This file reads the input data (model forcing) and write the output to netcdf file
